amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-158 to increase and decrease funding $103 million to Army Military Construction in an effort to address flooding damage at the United States Military Academy at West Point.
amendment.purpose: Amendment increases and decreases funding $103 million to Army Military Construction in an effort to address flooding damage at the United States Military Academy at West Point.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 394 - 19 (Roll no. 369).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ryan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ryan amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 394 - 19 (Roll no. 369).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
